reference.title: cxxUnionTemplateParameter
reference.shortdesc: The <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> element describes a union parameter.

section.title: Description
section.p: One or more <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> elements reside within the <cxxUnionTemplateParameters> container. <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> requires the child element <cxxUnionTemplateParameterType>; that describes the type of parameter. <cxxUnionTemplateParameter> may also contain the child element <apiDefNote> to describe the parameter further.
